name: ASSOCD_ORGANISMS
description:
This table contains the organisms which have been associated with infection cases. This can be used to find infection cases which were associated with a specific organism or MDRO definition.





These are not NHSN pathogens which are stored in NHSN_PS_FORM.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ASSOCD_ORGANISM_ID
columns.description: Stores the organisms records associated with the case. The allowed types are " (non-Beaker LLO), 1 (Beaker LLO), and 4 (MDRO Definition).
